Set the background color for table cells based on data values. Select values and colors. The color will be shown for cells matching or less than the value. Leaving a value blank indicates the max value.
Set the background color for table cells based on data values. Select values and colors. The color will be shown for cells matching the value. The asterisk (*) is a wild card character.
